page.title: 02NUTFIELD FOOTBALL CLUB.
page.content: {Nutfield Football Club}started in {1896.}It is one of the original members of the{Redhill and District {League.}It is the only one to have played continuously ever since that year except for the war years when the League was suspended.They have approximately{50 members}paying{Â£2.00 subscription plus{Â£1.50}fee per game. The{three teams}play about{90 {games}a year.The committee meets once a month and the teams are selected by the manager.They play{24 League games {a year,}half at home and half at the opponent's grounds.They also play {League,County Cup matches,and charity {games,}the venue depending on the luck of the draw.
